channel.title: Groovy scripting
channel.description:
Hi, I play a game called Haven and Hearth. It is a Sandbox game, IE, You die, you die forever. Anyways, the game allows botting and I need a programmer to look at the bot clients and tell me if the scripts are able to be converted to one system.
The two clients are: KT client, which has the better scripting system. https://github.com/k-t/Haven-and-Hearth-client-modified-by-Ender
And Arksu client, the worser scripting system.
http://code.google.com/p/hh-client/downloads/list
The SyS files are the main protocol for the scripts themselves, but inside the Haven.jars are the class files.
If i'm not providing enough information, and you want to help, please PM me.
